associatefeed.name: AssociateFeed
associatefeed.description: Grants permission to associate a feed with an AWS resource

createfeed.name: CreateFeed
createfeed.description: Grants permission to create a new feed

deletefeed.name: DeleteFeed
deletefeed.description: Grants permission to delete a feed

disassociatefeed.name: DisassociateFeed
disassociatefeed.description: Grants permission to disassociate a feed from an AWS resource

getfeed.name: GetFeed
getfeed.description: Grants permission to get feed details

getmetadata.name: GetMetadata
getmetadata.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata for a specific feed output

listfeeds.name: ListFeeds
listfeeds.description: Grants permission to list feeds in the account

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags on a resource

putmedia.name: PutMedia
putmedia.description: Grants permission to upload media data for a specified feed

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

updatefeed.name: UpdateFeed
updatefeed.description: Grants permission to update feed configuration
